scripts.start:dev: npx yarn env:dev && APP_VARIANT=development npx expo start -c
scripts.start:staging: npx yarn env:staging && APP_VARIANT=staging npx expo start -c
scripts.start:prod: npx yarn env:prod && APP_VARIANT=production npx expo start -c
scripts.web:dev: npx yarn env:dev && APP_VARIANT=development npx expo start --web -c
scripts.web:staging: npx yarn env:staging && APP_VARIANT=staging npx expo start --web -c
scripts.web:prod: npx yarn env:prod && APP_VARIANT=production npx expo start --web -c
scripts.build-android:dev-debug: npx yarn env:dev && npx yarn eas:config && npx eas build --platform android --profile development-debug
scripts.build-ios:dev-debug: npx yarn env:dev && npx yarn eas:config && npx eas build --platform ios --profile development-debug
scripts.build-android:dev-release: npx yarn env:dev && npx yarn eas:config && npx eas build --platform android --profile development-release
scripts.build-ios:dev-release: npx yarn env:dev && npx yarn eas:config && npx eas build --platform ios --profile development-release
scripts.build-android:staging-debug: npx yarn env:staging && npx yarn eas:config && npx eas build --platform android --profile staging-debug
scripts.build-ios:staging-debug: npx yarn env:staging && npx yarn eas:config && npx eas build --platform ios --profile staging-debug
scripts.build-android:staging-release: npx yarn env:staging && npx yarn eas:config && npx eas build --platform android --profile staging-release
scripts.build-ios:staging-release: npx yarn env:staging && npx yarn eas:config && npx eas build --platform ios --profile staging-release
scripts.build-android:prod-debug: npx yarn env:prod && npx yarn eas:config && npx eas build --platform android --profile production-debug
scripts.build-ios:prod-debug: npx yarn env:prod && npx yarn eas:config && npx eas build --platform ios --profile production-debug
scripts.build-android:prod-release: npx yarn env:prod && npx yarn eas:config && npx eas build --platform android --profile production-release
scripts.build-ios:prod-release: npx yarn env:prod && npx yarn eas:config && npx eas build --platform ios --profile production-release
